plot: A window into a mythological world, this contemporary flamenco-based dance piece explores cycles in time and offers a glimpse at one living moment in an endless chain of stillness and motion.
title: Time, Again
plot_es: A window into a mythological world, this contemporary flamenco-based dance piece explores cycles in time and offers a glimpse at one living moment in an endless chain of stillness and motion.
plot_en: A window into a mythological world, this contemporary flamenco-based dance piece explores cycles in time and offers a glimpse at one living moment in an endless chain of stillness and motion.
